mapper.select: SELECT '열량' Title, ROUND(SUM(A.TotalHeat), 1) FloorSum, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 1 THEN A.TotalHeat ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor1, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 2 THEN A.TotalHeat ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor2, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 3 THEN A.TotalHeat ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor3, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 4 THEN A.TotalHeat ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor4, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 5 THEN A.TotalHeat ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor5 FROM RoomC A where A.no = (select max(B.no) from RoomC B where A.Ho = B.Ho group by B.Ho) UNION ALL SELECT '유량' Title, ROUND(SUM(A.TotalFlow), 1) FloorSum, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 1 THEN A.TotalFlow ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor1, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 2 THEN A.TotalFlow ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor2, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 3 THEN A.TotalFlow ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor3, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 4 THEN A.TotalFlow ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor4, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.floor = 5 THEN A.TotalFlow ELSE 0 END), 1) Floor5 FROM RoomC A where A.no = (select max(B.no) from RoomC B where A.Ho = B.Ho group by B.Ho)

SELECT A.No, A.Floor, A.Ho, A.InsideTemp, A.SetTemp, A.InHeating, A.OutHeating, A.NowControlValue, A.SetControlValue, DATE_FORMAT(A.RegDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS RegDate, A.NowFlow, A.TotalFlow, (CASE WHEN A.OnOff = 0 THEN 'OFF' WHEN A.OnOff = 1 THEN 'ON' END) AS OnOff, A.TotalHeat, DATE_FORMAT(A.SetDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SetDate, A.InHeating - A.OutHeating AS DiffHeating FROM RoomC A WHERE A.no = (select max(B.no) from RoomC B where A.Ho = B.Ho group by B.Ho) AND A.Ho = #{ho}
